name: Käpt'n Blaubär: Bannig auf Zack
storyline: Käpt'n Blaubär (eng. Bluebear) needs to transport a box of invisible hamsters to an island that is dedicated as a zoo. But he needs to protect against Pirate Schwarzbart (engl. Blackbeard) first. To do so he gathers milk, bread and eggs to make some canon dumplings. After that he decides to pick up some Heligoland herring cake for the ride.
